column6: "POWER," PART 3 Things are not what they seem.  Not in Wakanda, and not in America.  As T'Challa takes the first steps along a pathway that will transform him forever, the new Black Panther fights for her life against the vicious super-villain know as Predator, unaware that it is merely a warm-up for a collision with one of the Marvel Universe's most powerful and feared players. Rated T  ...$2.99
